job_description:
Responsibilities: Necessity Service Limited (An approved institution by the People's Republic of Bangladesh Government) As part of the programs aimed at eradicating hunger, poverty, and unemployment in Bangladesh, Necessity Service Limited is recruiting personnel in various districts of Rajshahi Division. Qualified candidates are invited to apply for the ongoing operational and monitoring activities of the institution. Position: Area Sales Manager (ASM) Location: Respective police stations of each district in Rajshahi Division Job Type: Full-time Educational Qualifications Minimum HSC/ Honors or equivalent Preference will be given to experienced candidates in sales and management-related work Responsibilities and Duties Conducting and monitoring activities in the designated area Team management and monitoring Customer coordination and service assurance Achieving specified targets Salary and Benefits Monthly salary: 40,000 - 50,000 BDT Incentives and target bonuses Promotion opportunities Opportunity to work in your own area Application Process For more information or to apply, contact: üìû 01712610037 (GM - Naogaon District) üìû 01805000534 (DPD) üìû 01952000042 (Office Admin) Necessity Service Limited Your service, by your side.

job_description:
Responsibilities: Necessity Janaseba Limited (An institution approved by the Government of the People's Republic of Bangladesh) As part of the program aimed at eradicating hunger, poverty, and unemployment in Bangladesh, Necessity Janaseba Limited is recruiting personnel in various districts of Rangpur Division. Qualified and enthusiastic candidates are invited to apply for the management and monitoring of the institution's activities. Position: Area Sales Manager (ASM) Location: Each district of Rangpur Division's respective police stations Job Type: Full-time Educational Qualifications Minimum HSC/ Bachelor's degree or equivalent Preference will be given to candidates with experience in sales and management-related work Responsibilities Manage and supervise activities in the designated area Team coordination and monitoring Ensure customer service Achieve specified targets Salary and Benefits Monthly salary: 40,000 - 50,000 BDT Incentives and target bonuses Promotion opportunities Opportunity to work in your own area Application Process For more information or to apply, contact: üìû 01805000538 (PD) üìû 01952000042 (Office Admin) Necessity Janaseba Limited With you, by your side in your service.

company_address: Dhaka office : House -30 , Road 02, Banani, Dhaka
job_description:
Responsibilities: Organization Name: Prayojon Jonoseba Limited Approval: Approved by the Government of the People's Republic of Bangladesh As part of the program aimed at creating a hunger-free, poverty-free, and unemployment-free Bangladesh, personnel will be recruited for the position of Territory Sales Manager (TSM) in every union under all police stations in Naogaon district. The organization is currently implementing a supply program at 50% reduced prices for monthly markets (rice, lentils, oil, soap, flour, sugar, salt) until the next 5 (five) years. Responsible and hardworking individuals are invited to manage and monitor this program effectively. Job Description Position: Territory Sales Manager (TSM) Location: Candidate's own union (Naogaon district) Educational Qualification: Minimum SSC/HSC Candidate Qualifications and Attributes Must be honest, responsible, and hardworking Should be enthusiastic about community service Must have good communication skills Should have a mindset to work at the grassroots level Salary and Benefits Monthly salary: 25,000 - 30,000 Taka Incentives and target bonuses Promotion opportunities Application Process Interested candidates are requested to contact promptly. Contact Numbers: 01712610037 (GM - Naogaon district) 01805000534 (DPD) 01952000042 (Office Admin) Corporate Office Namajgar, Bogura Sadar, Bogura.

Responsibilities: Handle inbound and outbound customer communications via phone calls, Messenger, and other digital platforms. Respond to customer inquiries promptly and professionally to ensure high customer satisfaction. Guide potential customers and persuade them to place orders through effective communication. Process and confirm orders accurately in the system. Resolve customer complaints and provide appropriate solutions in a timely manner. Maintain proper follow-up with interested and existing customers. Keep records of customer interactions, orders, and feedback. Coordinate with the operations and delivery team to ensure smooth order fulfillment. Meet daily and monthly sales and service targets set by the management. Maintain a polite, positive, and brand-aligned communication style at all times.

Requirements: Minimum HSC or equivalent; graduate candidates will get preference

Strong communication skills in Bangla (spoken and written); basic English is a plus

Basic computer knowledge and typing skills are mandatory

Ability to handle customer calls and messages confidently

Willingness to work in flexible shifts

Prior experience in tele sales or customer service will be preferred

Good to Have (Preferred Skills)

Good presentation and persuasion skills

Strong problem-solving ability

Positive attitude and customer-first mindset

Ability to work under pressure and meet sales targets

Experience with Facebook Page, Messenger, or e-commerce platforms

Teamwork and coordination skills

Fast learner with adaptability to new tools and processes

Handle inbound and outbound customer communications via phone calls, Messenger, and other digital platforms. Respond to customer inquiries and professionally to ensure high customer satisfaction. Guide potential customers and influence them to place orders through effective communication. Process and confirm orders accurately in the system. Resolve customer complaints and provide appropriate solutions in a timely manner. Maintain proper follow-up with interested and existing customers. Keep records of customer interactions, orders, and feedback. Coordinate with the operations and delivery team to ensure smooth order fulfillment. Meet daily and monthly sales and service targets set by the management. Maintain a polite, positive, and brand-aligned communication style at all times.

Responsibilities: ```html Prohori - Vehicle Tracking Service (Partner of Rokomari.com) Job Circular | Tele Sales Associate Prohori Website Link: https://prohori.com/ Job Responsibilities: Explain Prohori's functionality to potential customers over the phone. Answer various questions of potential customers about Prohori. Keep each conversation with the customer in a specific sheet or CRM software. Must communicate with a certain number of potential customers every month. ```

Requirements: Description of the Position
Number of Positions: 10 (Female only)
Job Type: Full-time (Contractual/Permanent)
Workplace: Office Work
Location: Motijheel, Dhaka
Duty Time: 09:00 AM to 06:00 PM

Educational Qualifications: At least HSC.

Experience: Minimum 0-1 year. Freshers are encouraged to apply.

Additional Requirements for the Job:
1. Must have experience in operating desktop/laptop.
2. Must have a smartphone. SIM card and balance will be provided from the office.
3. Must be active online during work hours.
4. Must be proactive, hardworking, punctual, and cooperative.

Other Opportunities and Benefits:
1. Attractive sales commission.
2. Opportunity for permanent position and salary increment based on performance.
3. Opportunity for performance-based yearly salary increment.
4. Festival bonus twice a year.
5. Lunch arrangement at noon.
6. Free snacks and unlimited tea.
7. Prayer room and office library.
8. Free medical facilities at the office.
9. Medical leave, mandatory leave, and weekly holidays.
10. Career growth opportunities.
11. Discount on medical tests at reputable hospitals.
12. Special discounts on company products or services.
